p: For the MTE-mp emulgel (L-MTE-mp emulgel, Figure 5b), the addition of L improved the dimensional distribution behavior both in terms of reduction of the average diameter (d 50 of 2.626 Âµm) and in homogeneity. This result is graphically expressed by the loss of the slight tailing of the distribution curve, and by the lowest value of the span (2.3) obtained.
